ingredients.ingredient: 1 cup heavy cream, whipped to stiff peaks

cookingTips: Use double boiler to gently cook egg yolks and prevent scrambling
Whisk constantly over gentle heat until mixture reaches 160°F
Cool zabaglione before folding in whipped cream
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through the double boiler technique for safely cooking eggs and achieving proper zabaglione consistency.
